document: The adaptive cruise control adapts the vehicle’s speed to the flow of traffic.
rel_words: the: adaptive: cruise: control: adapts: vehicle’s: speed: to: flow: of: traffic

document: The adaptive cruise control ACC helps to adapt the speed in heavy traffic to the flow to keep a safe distance to the preceding vehicle.
rel_words: the: adaptive: cruise: control: acc: helps: to: adapt: speed: in: heavy: traffic: flow: keep: a: safe: distance: preceding: vehicle
